com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter

Class GPUImageChromaKeyBlendFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImageFilter
      • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImageTwoInputFilter
        • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImageChromaKeyBlendFilter

  • public class GPUImageChromaKeyBlendFilter
extends GPUImageTwoInputFilter
    Selectively replaces a color in the first image with the second image

      void onInit()

      void setColorToReplace(float redComponent, float greenComponent, float blueComponent)

      void setSmoothing(float smoothing)
      The degree of smoothing controls how gradually similar colors are replaced in the image The default value is 0.1
      void setThresholdSensitivity(float thresholdSensitivity)
      The threshold sensitivity controls how similar pixels need to be colored to be replaced The default value is 0.3

      • setColorToReplace

        public void setColorToReplace(float redComponent,
                              float greenComponent,
                              float blueComponent)
        The color to be replaced is specified using individual red, green, and blue components (normalized to 1.0). The default is green: (0.0, 1.0, 0.0).
        Parameters:
        redComponent - Red component of color to be replaced
        greenComponent - Green component of color to be replaced
        blueComponent - Blue component of color to be replaced
